item.title: Balatro now available for Switch 2
item.content:encoded:
• Switch 2

A free upgrade from the Switch version.

A Switch 2 version of poker roguelike game Balatro is now available via Nintendo eShop at a launch discount price of $11.99, publisher Playstack and developer LocalThunk announced. It is a free upgrade from the Switch version.

Balatro is also available for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, PC via Steam, iOS, and Android.

Here is an overview of the game, via Playstack:

The poker roguelike. Balatro is a hypnotically satisfying deckbuilder where you play illegal poker hands, discover game-changing jokers, and trigger adrenaline-pumping, outrageous combos.

Combine valid poker hands with unique Joker cards in order to create varied synergies and builds. Earn enough chips to beat devious blinds, all while uncovering hidden bonus hands and decks as you progress. You’re going to need every edge you can get in order to reach the boss blind, beat the final ante and secure victory.



https://www.gematsu.com/2026/02/balatro-now-available-for-switch-2

item.title: My Hero Academia: All’s Justice DLC character Star and Stripe launches February 26
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

America's Number One Pro Hero.

My Hero Academia: All’s Justice downloadable content character Star and Stripe will launch on February 26, publisher Bandai Namco and developer Byking announced. She can be purchased individually for $4.99, or as part of the $24.99 Season Pass.

My Hero Academia: All’s Justice is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam.

Watch a new trailer below.

DLC Character Star and Stripe Trailer
